name: Climate Control
description: This Pokemon's tempest-like body commands the weather itself to match the way it's own wind blows, regardless of whether it's howling winds, swarms of bugs, or scorching sun.
effect: The User's first Weather Move used during a scene may be performed as a Bonus Action during their turn (rolling as normal).
